abstract: NBA Roundup; Cleveland Cavaliers defeat Charlotte Hornets, 95-90; other basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: LeBron James extended his personal run of dominance against the Charlotte Hornets by leading the Cleveland Cavaliers to a 95-90 victory Friday night.

headline.main: Cavaliers and James Top Hornets Once Again
headline.print_headline: Cavaliers and James Top Hornets Once Again

snippet: LeBron James extended his personal run of dominance against the Charlotte Hornets by leading the Cleveland Cavaliers to a 95-90 victory Friday night.
